item.title: Telangana: Girl child born on RTC bus in Gadwal gets free lifetime travel
item.description:
<![CDATA[Telangana: Girl child born on RTC bus in Gadwal gets free lifetime travel
Appreciating the staff of the bus for taking care of the pregnant woman, Managing Director VC Sajjanar felicitated them at the Bus Bhavan on Wednesday
By Telangana Today Published Date - 5 February 2025, 06:45 PM
Managing Director VC Sajjanar felicitates the staff of the bus for taking care of the pregnant woman
Hyderabad: The Telangana State Road Transport Corporation (TGSRTC) management announced a lifetime free bus ...]]>
item.author: Telangana Today
